reviews.review:
This game has come a long way since I posted my negative review back in 2017. In the last few weeks I have come back to it and and I decided to recommend this game now.

This game offers a unique multiplayer horror experience and the developers have done an amazing job with bringing new content to this game and improving the overall gameplay with small quality of life changes.

Altough Dead by Daylight can still be somewhat rough in certain places like models, animations and user experience design, I recommend people giving this a try and experiencing this unique game.

Note: Queue times can be rather long so I'd recommend you to play a nice little game to the side. If you queue with friends, I'd recommend playing skribbl.io to pass the time ğŸ‘.

This game is actually really fun. A tiny, tiny bit buggy, but otherwise, a great game.

9/10 The only reason it isn't 10/10 is because the bugs usually involve the killer being able to do impossible things, such as taking you off a barrier from 21939239m away. Anyways, lots of fun

EDIT:
They have now fixed the game. I haven't run into bugs in a while, (besides the survivor flipping upside down for 1 second while being picked up, once). The killer is no longer OP besides their INCREDIBLE speed, which is part of the game, and they extremely optimized the game. I love the new menu revamp and I enjoy this game a lot more now.

Definitely a 10/10 now. Congrats.

People are so quick to thumb down this game.. and i'm not sure why.

Apart from obvious campers and people leaving out of frustration the game is great and the community is normally very friendly too!
It DOES have a few bugs, and matchmaking isn't the greatest but its worth it, great fun and very intense at times, it makes your heart race, and makes you hold your breath.

People just aren't giving the game a chance or enough credit which is a shame.
For the price the game is definitely worth buying, i'm just hoping they fix the matchmaking as it can be slow, thats the only real downside, even when it's being slow, it shouldn't have a thumbsdown, i'm totally confused why it does...

I can see how some would find this fun, but it isn't a game I'd waste money on unless it is on sale. Pretty buggy, kicks you out for 'anti cheat' software even if you're not using any such thing, connection issues and you lag like hell if the killer is hosting the server and is lagging. Add to that the fact that you are plunged into the game without any sort of tutorial to show you how the game works (there are videos which are a little helpful but it doesn't show you anything useful in terms of gameplay, what buttons to press etc)... It's not very intuitive to play either - when you find something in a chest, the game doesn't tell you what it is, you have to work that out for yourself.. Not an awful game by any means, I can see why people would want it and have fun playing it, but I'd give it 2/5-3/5. Not a top priority game.

super fun at first to play with friends, but then overtime it gets super repetitive and it gets boring, and the devs aren't that creative when creating killers or updating. but i mostly recommend it.

A lot of reviews are saying that Play with Friends doesn't work. I have never had the issues people describe. Does it work perfectly? No, sometimes you will get dropped from the lobby. But that's hardly a deal breaker when you can party back up and queue again. The game is fun, and like anything with some kind of competition between two teams there needs to be balance changes. They are constantly releasing new content and the game is overall really fun. Can't recommend it enough!
